sentences.sContent: When a famous cross-talk actor was asked about his impression of his visit to the United States, he replied.
sentences.sContent_eng: When a famous cross-talk actor was asked about his impression of his visit to the United States, he replied.
sentences.sCn: 有人问一位著名的相声演员对美国访问的印象，他回答说

sentences.sContent: Many post 80s performers talk about news headlines, catchwords, and the kind of things young people regularly talk about in their cross-talk routines.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many post 80s performers talk about news headlines, catchwords, and the kind of things young people regularly talk about in their cross-talk routines.
sentences.sCn: 许多80后的相声演员在他们的相声段子中就新闻时事、流行词汇等年轻人日常谈论的内容进行评说。
